Headline: Westbound #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute near Cermak/Hyone.
ShortDescription: Westbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Western, Blue Island, Damen, and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Hyone.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Western, Blue Island, Damen, and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Hyone. 

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier door problem on the train near Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier door problem on the train near Roosevelt. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
